The profits from the business will be used for adding to the money she already has for buying a house because she is tired of renting. She is very thankful with the previous loan, which she says helped the business.

loans.use: To buy more foodstuffs to sell.

loans.name: Chicane

texts.en:
Chicane is 25 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is single with 1 child. 
Chicane is making and selling barbeque. She has had this business for 4 years. She requested a loan for 5,000 PHP to buy raw ingredients in making barbeque like meat and spices.
Chicane is a new member of HSPFI.  In the future, Chicane hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy raw ingredients to make barbeque

loans.name: Getrude

texts.en: Getrude continues living with her husband with their two children who are all attending school. She has been operating a tailoring business for some time, business she is still into. In order to diversify her sources of income, Getrude opened a shop selling to the neighborhood. She sells general staples such as flour, sugar, and other consumer goods. Getrude says that inventory has gone down; so she is asking another loan so as to add stock of flour, rice, sugar, and other small fast-selling products. This way, she will be able to provide for her family. She hopes to expand her businesses so as to continue moving ahead.

loans.use: to add stock of flour, rice, sugar, and other small fast-selling products.

loans.name: Alimardon

texts.en:
Alimardon is an industrious person who is married and has a little son. He has been busy with animal husbandry more than three years. Little by little, with the passing of the years, he has perfected his knowledge. Thanks to the good condition of his animals, he has managed to win a large number of customers for his business. He sells his animal in the local market and has many customers. 

Alimardon is looking for a loan to buy young cattle. Each month he will make his payments on time. He awaits your help and mercy.

loans.use: To buy young cattle

loans.name: Anastacia

texts.en:
Anastacia, age 23, earns her living as a rice farmer. For additional income, she raises hogs. She lives in the town of San Miguel, Bohol, with her husband and their five-year-old son. Her husband works as a driver.

She is asking for a loan in order to buy healthy seedlings and fertilizer and to pay for labor. In four months' time, she will use her profit to offer her family a healthy diet and to increase her savings. 

In the future, she hopes to have the chance to pursue other business opportunities, with her ultimate goal being  to improve the living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to buy healthy seedlings and fertilizer and to pay for labor

loans.name: Fredy

texts.es:
El señor Fredy es soltero y  vive en su casa propia a pesar de ser soltero, poseer casa propia el se esfuerza por salir adelante para ayudar a sus padres.
El señor es dueño de una pequeña empresa comercial, está en el negocio de venta de aceites y combustibles para vehículos hace mas de 10 años y ya cuenta con una fama propia construida gracias al sacrificio.
Fredy necesita el crédito para poder comprar los insumos como aceites para autos y motos, combustibles de todas las calidades, necesarios para que su local crezca y se expanda.
texts.en: Fredy is single and lives in a house of his own despite being single.  He strives to own a house and to get ahead to help his parents.  He owns a small commercial firm where he sells oil and fuel for vehicles.  He’s been in business more than ten years and he has a good reputation that’s the result of his hard work.  Fredy needs the loan to buy supplies like automobile and motorcycle oils and fuel of all grades that are needed for his business to grow and expand.

loans.use: to buy fuel and oil.

loans.name: Anabell

texts.es: Anabel tiene 34 años de edad, es soltera, y vive con sus padres en una aldea del municipio de Choloma, cortes. Anabel trabajo en una maquila, pero su aspiración a obtener más ingresos para ayudar a sus padres decidió independizarse obteniendo su propio negocio, el cual es una pulpería, que logro establecer hace 8 años, vendiendo productos de la canasta básica, como frijoles, arroz, harina, azúcar, pan, huevos, etc. y productos de abarrotería. Además ella recibe otros ingresos por realizar actividades de confección de prendas de vestir. Agradece por el préstamo anterior ya que le ayudo mucho a incrementar las ventas. Actualmente está solicitando otro préstamo por 28,000 Lempiras para surtir mas su pulpería en la compra de lácteos, harina, arroz, azúcar, frijoles, manteca, huevos, pan.etc. Su meta es darles a sus clientes mejor atención y obtener más ganancias para un mejor nivel de vida.
texts.en:
Anabel, 34, is single and lives with her parents in a village in the municipality of Choloma, Cortes.  She used to work in an assembly plant but wanting to earn more income to help her parents she decided to become independent and open her own business which is a grocery store.  

She did so 8 years ago selling basic staples like beans, rice, flour, sugar, bread, eggs, groceries, etc.  She also earns additional income making clothes.  

She is grateful for the previous loan because it helped her increase sales very much.  She is currently asking for another 28,000 Lempira loan to better stock her grocery store; she will buy dairy products, flour, rice, sugar, beans, lard, eggs, bread, etc.  

Her goal is to give her customers the best service and to earn more profits for a better standard of living.

loans.use: to buy merchandise to stock her store.

loans.name: David

texts.es:
David es un hombre de 34 años de edad y vive con su madre y un sobrino menor de edad en la comunidad de San Rafael de Florencia de San Carlos, en la provincia de Alajuela. Esta comunidad rural presenta mucho potencial de desarrollo a través de las actividades agrícolas. La zona  posee un clima caliente, lo que permite la producción de ciertas frutas que se desarrollan con más fuerza gracias a  este tipo de clima  como el mango, el melón y otros propios de la zona.  La localidad de Florencia se caracteriza por sus parques nacionales y su extensa variedad de flora y fauna. 
David nos comenta que el único ingreso en su familia es el suyo , estudia en horario nocturno y  además tiene a cargo la educación de su  sobrino  , él  tiene  un vivero hidropónico  en el cual se produce  tomate y  chile dulce, y ahora necesita extenderse en un área mayor , necesita comprar semillas, químicos , arena, tubos plásticos para riego  entre otros materiales.
El está solicitando un crédito de un millón cuarenta mil  colones (¢1.040.000) para lograr metas propuestas , él pertenece a la empresa de Crédito Comunal de ECCSAR S.A, este será su primer préstamo razón por la cual está  muy agradecido, por las oportunidades  de acceso al crédito que esta le brinda y poder llevar a cabo sus proyectos .
texts.en:
David is a man of 34 years old and lives with his mother and a young nephew in the community of San Rafael de Florencia de San Carlos, in the province of Alajuela.  This rural community has a great deal of development potential through agricultural activities.  The area has a warm climate that permits the production of certain fruits that can be grown better thanks to this type of climate such as mangoes, melons and other local fruits.  The area of Florencia is characterized by its national parks and its extensive variety of flora and fauna.  

David tells us that his family's only income is his.  He studies at night and also takes charge of the education of his nephew.  He has a hydroponic greenhouse in which he grows tomatoes and sweet peppers and now he wants to make it larger.  He needs to buy seeds, chemicals, sand, and plastic tubing for irrigation among other materials.  He is requesting a loan of one million forty thousand colones to achieve his goals.  He belongs to the Crédito Comunal de ECCSAR S.A.  This will be his first loan and he is very grateful for the opportunities to access credit that this gives him and to be able to complete his projects.

loans.use: to buy seed.

loans.name: Ann

texts.en: Ann is 34 years old, married with five children who are in school. She sells cereals to earn a living. Besides, she does farming to generate more income. She has been operating this business for ten years and has one employee. She had previously acquired a loan from Faulu Kenya which helped her to grow her business. She has also learnt how to manage her business because she has been trained on business management. Ann dreams of expanding her business in the future. She has requested a loan of 20,000 KES to buy household items like cupboards.

loans.use: To buy household goods

loans.name: Cepeda Vera

texts.es:
PRISCILA ES SOLTERA TIENE 27 AÑOS ES MADRE SOLTERA TIENE DOS HIJOS Y VIVE EN CASA DE SUS PADRES EN VENTANAS.

PRISCILA TRABAJA EN UNA CASA CUIDADO A UN ANSIANO EL DINERO LO SOLICITA PARA APOYAR A SUS PADRES CON LOS GASTOS DE LA CASA Y COMPRAR ROPAS A SUS HIJOS. 

ELLA SUEÑA CON PODER COMPRAR UN SOLAR PARA CONSTRUIR UNA CASA. EN LOS TIEMPOS LIBRES LE GUSTA DESCANSAR.
texts.en: Priscila, 27, is single and the single mother of two children; she lives in her parents’ house in Ventanas.  Priscila works in a private home caring for a senior citizen.  She’s requesting the loan to help her parents cover household expenses and to buy clothes for her children.  She dreams with being able to buy a lot to build her house.  In her free time she likes to rest.

loans.use: to buy clothes for her children and to pay household expenses.

loans.name: Luciano

texts.en:
Luciano is a merchant living in Bohol, Philippines. He runs a sari-sari store or convenience store for more than 20 years now. 
Luciano is a member of CEVI for several years now. As of this time, he is asking for a loan worth 20,000 PHP to buy more items to sell like noodles, canned goods, soda, snack foods and others. With this, he will be able to cater to more customers and buyers.
Luciano hopes of expanding his business in the future in order to generate more income for the needs and expenses of the family. Moreover, he wants to uplift the standard of living of the family and experience fullness of life.

loans.use: to buy more items to sell like noodles, canned goods, soda, snack foods and others

loans.name: Margot

texts.es:
La socia Margot tiene 24 años de edad y es soltera pero aun no tiene hijos, ella pertenece al banco comunal “Esmeralda” de la Asociación Arariwa y es natural de la ciudad del Cusco y vive en la mima ciudad donde nació, ella está estudiando la carrera profesional de enfermería pero está empezando con el negocio de venta de materiales de construcción. En esta oportunidad la socia Margot requiere el préstamo para comprar materiales de construcción como por ejemplo arena, cemento, ladrillos y otras cosas más.

La socia Margot se encuentra agradecido por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.
texts.en: Margot, 24, is single and does not have any children yet.  She belongs to Asociación Arariwa’s “Esmeralda” (Emerald) communal bank.  She was born in the city of Cusco and still lives there.  She’s studying nursing but has started a business selling building materials and supplies.  On this occasion, Margot needs the loan to buy building materials like sand, cement, bricks and other things.  Margot is grateful for the opportunity being given her this way and commits to make her payments as scheduled.

loans.use: to buy building materials and supplies.

loans.name: Elma

texts.en:
Elma is 54 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with 5 children. 
Elma is buying and selling vegetables. She has had this business for 8 years. She requested a loan for 5,000 PHP to buy more vegetables to resell like eggplants and green leafy vegetables.
Elma is a new member of HSPFI.  In the future, Elma hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy more vegetables to resell

loans.name: Jaime Arturo

texts.es:
JAIME TIENE 21 AÑOS ES SOLTERA VIVE CON LOS PADRES EN VENTANAS.

SE DEDICA A LA AGRICULTURA A LA SIEMBRA DE MAIZ EN TERRENOS PROPIOS EL DINERO NECESITA COMPRAR DE ABONOS Y FERTILIZANTES.

EL SUEÑO DE JAIME ES TENER DIUNERO PARA LA COMPRA DE UN TERRENO.

EN LOS TIEMPOS LIBRES SE DEDICA A DESCARZAR.
texts.en: Jaime, 21, is single living with his parents in Ventanas.  He works in agriculture growing corn on his own fields.  He needs the money to buy manure and fertilizer.  Jaime’s dream is to have money to buy a piece of land.  He spends his free time resting.

loans.use: to buy manure and fertilizer.

loans.name: Morris

texts.en:
Morris is 36 years old, married and a father of four children. For the last twelve years, he has earned a living by selling goods from his retail shop. He earns a monthly profit of KES 15,000. 

He was introduced to KADET LTD by a credit officer, and is applying for his first loan of KES 40,000 to buy additional stock such as soft drinks, cooking oil for sale to his customers. He will use the profits made possible by this loan to pay school fees for his children. 

His goal for the future is to continue growing his business so that he can give his family a good and stable life.

loans.use: to buy additional stock such as soft drinks, cooking oil for sale.

loans.name: Alberta

texts.en: Alberta is an active member of PMPC since 2010.  She is 67 years old, single, and a resident of Cangbagsa, Larena, Siquijor.  She engages in sari-sari store for more than 10 years with an average monthly earnings of PHP 2,000.  She took a loan in PMPC to purchase additional stocks for sale.  She is planning to save out from her income in preparation for her old-age future.

loans.use: to purchase additional stocks for sale

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en:
Joseph is 27 years old, and a clothes dealer in Kongowea, Mombasa. He is married and has been selling clothes for the past five years with success.

This marks his second business loan from KADET LTD to finance his business. He plans to purchase more shirts, skirts, dresses and trousers. He will use the anticipated profits to open another clothes shop. 

He hopes to excel in this business and in life.

loans.use: to purchase more shirts, skirts, dresses and trousers

loans.name: Sreymov's Group

texts.en:
Originally from the Moung Russey district of Battambang province, Cambodia, Sreymov is 24 years old and has one dependent son who is under school age. To make a living, she and her husband have been farming rice on one hectare of farmland and earning additional income through growing beans and sesame, and by sometimes working as a paid construction worker in a local area. They have been in this business for several years. Together, they are able to earn about 20,000 KHR per day and manage to save about 14,000 each day after daily expenses. Low crop yield resulting from the drought is the main challenge for Sreymov's business.

Sreymov’s group consists of five members who live in the same village. She and three other members have been with VisionFund for one cycle while the fifth member is in the first cycle with VisionFund. 

Sreymov's past loan helped her support her family in living better. Now the leader of her group, Sreymov will use her portion to buy fertilizers and rice seeds for her farmland and to pay for labor costs. She hopes this loan will help her current business grow and will increase her income so as to improve her family’s lifestyle.

loans.use: To buy fertilizers and rice seeds for her farmland and to pay for labor costs

loans.name: Smbat

texts.en: Smbat is involved in agriculture. He breeds cows, hens and sheep, as well as cultivating barley. Smbat would like to purchase grass as forage for the cattle. This will allow Smbat to feed the cattle during winter and keep on developing his farm.

loans.use: to buy grass as forage for his cattle

loans.name: Elvira

texts.en:
Elvira is 51 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with four children. 

Elvira sells green leafy vegetables in her community. She has had this business for eight years. She has requested a loan for 5,000 PHP to buy more green leafy vegetables to sell.

Elvira is a new member of HSPFI. In the future, Elvira hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy more green leafy vegetables to sell

loans.name: Segundo Cristobal

texts.es:
Segundo Cristobal tiene 38 años, Es casado vive con la esposa y con con los hijos de 3 años y 6 meses de edad, en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos. 

Los miembros de la V.R.C. EL DIVINO NIÑO, se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Estero Lindo, perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto como siembre de maíz y arroz. 

Segundo Cristobal se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz y arroz. Compra los productos en Ventanas.

Solicita el crédito para comprar semillas, abonos, insecticidas, ranger. Con el apoyo del crédito podrá  comprar lo necesario para los cultivos. 

Enfrenta desafíos como plagas en los cultivos y la falta de dinero para pagar a mas trabajadores. El sueño es comprar una finca y una carro.

En el tiempo libre le gusta el deporte y pasear.
texts.en:
Segundo Cristobal is 38 years old. He is married and lives with his wife and children, ages 6 months and 3 years, in Ventanas canton, De Los Rios province.  

The members of the "El Divino Niño" communal bank live in the Estero Lindo community in Ventanas canton. The members of the communal bank work in short-cycle farming, growing corn and rice.  

Segundo Cristobal is a farmer, and grows corn and rice. He buys his products in Ventanas.

He is applying for the loan to buy seeds, fertilizers, insecticides and herbicide. With the help of the loan, he will be able to buy what he needs for his crops.  

He faces challenges such as crop pests and lack of money to pay more workers. His dream is to buy a farm and a car. 

In his free time he likes sports and going for walks.

loans.use: To buy seeds, fertilizers, insecticides and herbicide.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy seed and farm supplies, animal feed and stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Marvilla

texts.en:
Marvilla is a 58-year-old married woman from Bohol, Philippines. She is in hog-raising business for four years now. She is also in food-vending business. These provide her the income that she needs.
Marvilla is in need of additional capital for the expansion of her ventures. She is asking for a loan worth 5,000 PHP to buy feeds for the pigs and ingredients for her food-vending business. With this, she will be able to grow healthy pigs.
Marvilla dreams of expanding her business to generate more revenue which will be used for the family expenses, reinvestment of the same business and savings.

loans.use: to buy feeds for the pigs and ingredients for her food-vending business

loans.name: Concordia

texts.en: Concordia is 51 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with 1 child. Concordia has a food/retail shop or sari-sari store that buys & sells canned goods, snacks, personal care products, home use products & beverages. She's had this business for 8  years. She requested a loan for 5,000 PHP to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks & beverages. Concordia  has been a member of HSPFI since 2008. In the future, Concordia hopes to improve her business for the education of her grandchild.

loans.use: to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks and beverages

loans.name: Jennylyn

texts.en: Jennylyn is a new member of PMPC under micro-finance program.  She is 25 years of age, single mom with a one-year-old infant.  She is residing in Bino-ongan, Enrique Villanueva in the province of Siquijor.  To support her daily needs, she engaged in making snacks for sale in their village. She runs the business for 1 year with an average monthly income of PHP 3,000.  She wants to use the money she took from PMPC to purchase additional raw materials for sale to increase her income to support the needs of her child.

loans.use: to purchase additional raw materials

loans.name: Nune

texts.en: Nune lives in Kapan town with her husband and 17-year-old daughter. Nune and her husband are involved in beekeeping. Currently, they keep 7 colonies of bees. In order to expand the farm, Nune would like to purchase more beehives. This will allow Nune to gather more honey and earn more income. This is important for Nune to improve her family's living conditions and pay for her daughter's education.

loans.use: to pay for beehives and colonies of bees

loans.name: Dorotea

texts.en:
Dorotea is 50 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with 5 children. 
Dorotea is buying and selling fish in their community. She has had this business for 6 years. She requested a loan for 4,000 PHP to buy a variety of fish to resell like lapu-lapu, milk fish and flying fish.
Dorotea has been a member of HSPFI since 2010. In the future, Dorotea hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy variety of fish to resell

loans.name: Yirley

texts.es:
Yirley es una joven de 30 años de edad, madre de dos hijos  vive con su esposo en la comunidad de San Rafael de Florencia de San Carlos, en la provincia de Alajuela. Esta comunidad rural presenta mucho potencial de desarrollo a través de las actividades agrícolas. La zona  posee un clima caliente,  lo que permite la producción de ciertas frutas que se desarrollan con más fuerza gracias a  este tipo de clima  como el mango, el melón y otros propios de la zona.  La localidad de Florencia se caracteriza por sus parques nacionales y su extensa variedad de flora y fauna. 

Yirley  junto con su esposo han hecho grandes esfuerzos para construir su vivienda,  sin embargo no han podido aún terminarla, por lo que  solicita un crédito de un millón de colones (¢1.000.000) para comprar materiales de construcción como cemento, arena, piedra , pintura y otros y de esta manera ofrecer a sus hijos una vivienda digna .
Ella es miembro de la Empresa de Crédito Comunal de Eccsar S.A, este será su primer préstamo razón por la cual está  muy agradecida, por las oportunidades  de acceso al mismo que ésta le brinda y poder llevar a cabo su objetivo.
texts.en:
Yirely, 30, is a young woman mother of two children living with her husband in the community San Rafael de Florencia de San Carlo in Alajuela Province.  This rural community has much development potential through agriculture.  It has a hot climate which allows for cultivation of certain fruits like mangoes, melons and others typical of the zone  that develop more strongly due to this type of climate.  Florencia is noted for its national parks and lush flora and fauna.

Yirely and her husband have worked hard to build their house.  However, they still haven’t finished it which is why she’s requesting a one-million colon (¢1.000.000) loan to buy building materials like cement, stone, paint and others to provide their children with a proper home.

She is a member of “Eccsar S.A.” credit firm and this will be her first loan; she is very grateful for it and for the opportunities to access it that are being granted her so that she can reach her objective.

loans.use: to buy building materials and supplies to finish building her house.

loans.name: Sophal's Group

texts.en:
Sophal lives in a rural village of Kandal province’s Kandal Stoeng district in Cambodia. She has four children; two of her daughters are dependent on her and are still in school. She earns a living through farming rice, while her husband works as a paid construction worker in the local area. Their current business earns them about 15,000 KHR per day to support their family. 

Sophal’s group consists of four members who are all applying for their first loan with VisionFund. She is leading her group and she will use her 160,000 KHR portion of the loan to buy materials for building a proper latrine, including a latrine bowl and tile draining. She hopes this loan will enable her to have a healthy latrine for her family's use so as to create a hygienic standard of living.

loans.use: To buy materials for building a proper latrine for her family

loans.name: Persi

texts.es:
El socio Persi tiene 22 años de edad y es soltero pero aun no tiene hijos, él pertenece al banco comunal “Esmeralda” de la Asociación Arariwa y es natural de la ciudad de Calca pero vive en la hermosa ciudad del Cusco, él es un joven trabajador y responsable que se dedica a la venta de materiales de construcción. En esta oportunidad el socio Persi requiere el préstamo para comprar materiales de construcción como por ejemplo arena, cemento, ladrillos y otras cosas más.

El socio Persi se encuentra agradecido por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.
texts.en: Persi, 22, is single; he has no children yet.  He belongs to Asociación Arariwa’s “Esmeralda” (Emerald) communal bank.  He’s originally from the city of Calca but lives in the beautiful city of Cusco.  He’s a hardworking, responsible young man who sells building materials and supplies.  On this occasion, Persi needs the loan to buy building materials and supplies like sand, cement, bricks and others.  Persi is grateful for the opportunity provided by this means and commits to make his installments as scheduled.

loans.use: to buy building materials and supplies.

loans.name: Faustino

texts.es:
El socio Faustino tiene 67 años de edad y es viudo pero tiene dos hijos, él pertenece al banco comunal “Esmeralda” de la Asociación Arariwa y es natural de la ciudad de Acomayo pero vive en la hermosa ciudad del Cusco, él es un padre trabajador y responsable que saca adelante a su familia, él se dedica a la renovación de calzados y tiene un pequeño local donde está equipado con la necesidades básicas. En esta oportunidad el socio Faustino requiere el préstamo para comprar materiales de trabajo como por ejemplo suela, cuero, hilos, cremas de zapatos y otras cosas más.

El socio Faustino se encuentra agradecido por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.
texts.en: Faustino, 67, is a widower and has two children.  He belongs to Asociación Arariwa’s “Esmeralda” (Emerald) communal bank.   He’s originally from the city of Acomayo but lives in the beautiful city of Cusco.  He’s a hardworking, responsible father who supports his family.  He repairs shoes; he has a small workshop equipped with the basics.  On this occasion, Faustino needs the loan to buy work supplies like soles, leather, thread, shoe polish and others.  Faustino is grateful for the opportunity provided by this means and commits to make his payments as scheduled.

loans.use: to buy supplies.

loans.name: Maria Alicia

texts.es:
María, solicita un nuevo préstamo para poder continuar fortaleciendo el negocio en la venta de ropa, en esta ocasión continuará adquiriendo prendas de vestir con nuevos estilos en ropa interior, blusas, faldas, que le permitirá mejorar el inventario de la mercadería y al mismo tiempo tener todo lo necesario para sus clientes.

Considera que el préstamo anterior le dio un efecto positivo ya que ha permanecido en el mercado con una condición estable en sus ventas, sus circunstancias familiares han sido cada vez mejor, obteniendo ingresos para poder apoyar a su familia.
texts.en:
María requests a new loan to continue strengthening her clothing sales business.  On this occasion she will continue acquiring articles of clothing in new styles of underwear, blouses and skirts that will provide her with a better inventory of merchandise while at the same time having everything needed for her customers.

She feels that the previous loan had a positive effect because she’s been able to stay in business with stable sales.  Her family situation has gotten better and better and she’s earned income to be able to support her family.

loans.use: to buy clothes.

loans.name: Azimkul

texts.en: Azimkul is 42 years old. He is married to a lovely woman by the name of Siporat. They bring up their son perfectly. He is 14 years old. 20 years ago, he began his own business dealing with animal husbandry. Now, he is one of the best and successful business men in the local market. He buys cows, cares for them for 2 or 3 months and sells to local people. He wants to buy sheep for developing business but he has no money for it. He is asking for a loan of 3000 somoni to buy sheep. In this way he will provide his family with high quality of living condition. Moreover, he will enter his child in a good school. He promises to make his payment on time. He awaits your support.

loans.use: To buy sheep

loans.name: Reynaldo Jose

texts.es:
Reynaldo José  de  48 años de edad vive en la ciudad de Chinandega, un lugar en el occidente de Nicaragua la cual se caracteriza por ser una zona de mucho comercio. Está casado y tiene un hijo de menor de edad de  3 ½ años. Tiene por actividad económica la  venta de mercadería en general, la cual consisten en la venta de ropa de niño, de adulto, zapatos, cosméticos, juegos de sabanas, juegos de toallas, la cual la distribuye de forma ambulante todos los días.  El tiene que recorrer la ciudad con 35 º C/95 º F  el cual tiene que cargar el peso de las maletas hasta 20 kg día a día para poder su mercadería a clientes fijos y eventuales. En la foto aparece con maletas. Los años de experiencia en el negocio 12 años, Reynaldo se caracteriza por ser muy trabajador, el cual inicio el negocio con ayuda de un hermano y trabajando con otros comerciantes. 
Reynaldo invertirá el préstamo en la compra de mercadería en general como: pantalones de adulto, camisas, camisetas, vestidos, sandalias, cosméticos, juegos de sabanas entre otros. Y además necesita surtir su inventario para ofrecer variedad de productos a sus clientes y satisfacer  la demanda.
En la actualidad ha podido cumplir con sueños y metas como es terminar de construir su casa para darle mayor estabilidad a su familia.
texts.en:
Reynaldo José, 48, lives in the city of Chinandega, a place in west Nicaragua noted for being very commercial.  He’s married and has a three-and-a-half-year-old son.  

His economic activity is selling merchandise in general consisting in children’s and adults’ clothes, shoes, cosmetics, sets of bed linens and towel sets that he sells from place to place every day.  He has to walk the city in temperatures of 35ºC/95ºF carrying a suitcases weighing up to 20 kilos every day to sell his merchandise to his regular customers and to anyone else.  

In the photo he appears with the suitcases.  He has 12 years’ experience in business and Reynaldo is noted for being very hardworking.  He started the business with help from his brother and working with other merchants.

Reynaldo will invest the loan in the purchase of general merchandise like pants for adults, shirts, t-shirts, dresses, sandals, cosmetics, bed linens and others.  He also needs to stock his inventory in order to offer a variety of products to his customers and meet demand.

He has been able to reach his dreams and goals at present like finishing building his house and providing more stability for his family.

loans.use: to buy merchandise to resell.

loans.name: Duo Un Amor Verdadero Group

texts.es: Dúo un amor verdadero: Este Dúo está integrado por la señora Sabina es originaria de San Martin, Tiene 56 años de edad, ella lleva 20 años de dedicarse a la crianza de animales (pollos, pavos, patos.)los crese y luego cuando ya están grandes y gordos los vende a un mejor precio, ya ha tenido crédito y le da gracias a Dios porque durante el tiempo que ha pagado sus créditos no ha caído en mora, está solicitando este crédito para la compra de más animales para la crianza y luego venderlos.
texts.en: A Real Love group: Sabina, from San Martin, is a member of this group. She is 56 years old. For 20 years she has raised animals (chickens, turkeys, and ducks). She raises them and then sells them for a better price when they are big and fat. She has already had a loan and she thanks God because during the time she has been paying back her loans she has not fallen behind. She is asking for this loan to purchase more animals to raise and then sell.

loans.use: to purchase animals to raise and then sell once they are grown (chickens, turkeys, and ducks)

loans.name: Violeta

texts.en:
Violeta is in her mid forties and married. She has five children; all attending school accordingly. They have come from a very rural and rocky area a few years back, to reside in their current village. “The first few years, setbacks and disappointments seemed to never end,” Violeta said, lowering her head in despair. Despite the fact that they live way below the poverty level, she hopes that she will be able to send all of her children to university  “because they deserve it; they do very good in school and they have made me a very proud mother,” she said. 
For almost a year now, she has been selling dairy and baby calves to the local market and since she likes it, she thought that by expanding it, she would gain a better income for her family. The loan Violeta is requesting now through Kiva will enable her to purchase a milk cow. This won’t be her first loan; however, the previous two ones have been paid on time. 
An appreciation to all lenders at Kiva, is what Violeta wants to deliver at this point and hopes that their kindness will make it possible for her to buy the cow she is looking for.

loans.use: To purchase a milk cow

loans.name: Monaliza

texts.en:
Monaliza is a merchant from Talibon, Bohol, Philippines, selling garments and other items to the people in her community.  She has been in this business for three years. Her husband is a fisherman.

Monaliza works hard to support her husband in meeting the needs of the family. She is requesting a loan for 9,000 PHP, which she will use to buy more garments to sell and new fishing net for her husband. She dreams of improving her business and making it a success. Monaliza hopes to raise their standard of living and experience a full life together with her family.

loans.use: to purchase more garments to sell and new fishing net for her husband.

loans.name: Severina

texts.en: Severina says that he benefited a lot from the previous loan: his stock has increased, he has paid part of his children school fees, and now he is taking anther loan to increase his business capital and plans on building a house, and he says he is happy for the support Kiva is giving to finance Sudan.

loans.use: to purchase more items like, salt, tomato sauce, nomi, tea leaves, soap and many items.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more fruits to resell

loans.name: Hadijah

texts.en:
Hadijah is 50 years old, married, and has three children, one of whom works and two of whom attend university.  Her husband is a building contractor. 

Even though her husband has a regular income to meet the family needs, Hadijah does not want to solely rely on her husband’s income. One of Hadijah hobbies is making cakes and she utilizes this skill to generate income. She produces different types of cakes and cookies, such as bread, platter cakes, sponge cakes, chocolate cookies, “nastar” cakes (made of wheat flour, margarine, eggs, and jam), etc. Hadijah distributes her products to traditional market and kiosks. 

Hadijah is thinking of expanding her business by providing many more types of cakes in large quantities. She is requesting a loan for 4,000,000 IDR from TLM, which she will use to purchase flour, rice flour, margarine, eggs, cheese, and other ingredients. She believes that the business has good prospects for the future and would enable her to generate more income for the family.

loans.use: to purchase flour, rice flour, margarine, eggs, cheese and other ingredients.

loans.name: Marjeta

texts.en:
Marjeta is forty-two and married. She has four children ranging in age from five to twenty years old with two of them attending school. Their family lives in the northern east part of the country where heavy snow, freezing temperatures and avalanches deteriorate the situation in the winter.
   Marjeta has been selling dairy and animals for the past ten years. Now that winter is kicking in soon, she wants to build a better and bigger stable for her animals.This is the reason that she is requesting a Kiva loan through VisionFund Albania and this, will be her very first one.
   Marjeta has been the only financial provider for their family of six, for the longest time now; yet, her husband has been helping her in the business and she is content these past years with the earnings and the business process in overall.

loans.use: To rebuild a damaged stable

loans.name: Judith

texts.en: Judith, a 30-year-old mother of three children, is married to a farmer. Judith has been selling fish for 14 years, earning a monthly income of 6,800 shillings. Now requesting her second loan from KADET LTD to purchase more fish for resale in order to meet market demand, she will reinvest the anticipated profit in her business.

loans.use: to buy more stocks of fish for resale.

loans.name: Sughran

texts.en:
Ms. Sughran is a very active and hard-working lady and she has been been selling milk for the last six years to support her family. Her husband’s income was not enough to fulfill their basic necessities. But her efforts succeeded and now she has 12 buffaloes for this purpose and has become the main earner of her family. 

She is a responsible mother of two sons and three daughters. She is worried about their future and wants to provide them with good education.  For this she requires expanding her business and needs a loan of Rs. 30,000 to buy more buffaloes to increase in quantity of sales of milk. She hopes to have a good experience with this new loan.

loans.use: To buy more buffaloes.

loans.name: La Amistad Group

texts.es:
El comité La Amistad esta conformado por mujeres independientes que se dedican en su mayoría a la venta ambulante de productos como libros, ropa interior, artículos de peluquería, cosméticos inclusive alimentos.Todas y cada una de ellas se empeña en progresar y salir adelante en la actividad a la que se dedica.
Una integrante, Vidalina, es peluquera hace varios años y ya tiene su propia clientela. Ella busca satisfacer las necesidades de su clientela para poder también satisfacer sus necesidades básicas con el dinero que le genere esta actividad.
La señora necesita el crédito para poder comprar los productos del salón como cremas para pelo, peines, cepillos, pinturas, esmaltes, etc lo necesario para poder cumplir con las demandas de las clientes que son puntillosas.
texts.en:
The La Amistad communal bank is made up of independent women, a majority of whom are street vendors selling products such as books, underwear, hair care products, cosmetics, and even food.  Each and every one of them tries hard to progress, and to succeed in the work they do. 

One member, Vidalina, has been a hairdresser for several years, and already has her own clientele. She seeks to satisfy the needs of her clientele, so that she can also meet her basic needs with the money that this work generates. 

She needs the loan to be able to buy products for her salon, such as hair creams, combs, brushes, hair dyes, nail polishes, etc. These are what she needs to meet the demands of her customers, who are fussy.

loans.use: To buy hair salon products such as creams, hair dyes, brushes, etc.

loans.name: Joumana

texts.en:
Joumana is a 42-year-old married woman, who opened a convenience store two years ago to improve her living with a better income. She used to work in a clothes selling shop for three years, but she made up her mind and turned to more requested items business to improve her living.
Joumana is very smart, she puts so much effort on improving her business upon customers requests. She applied for a loan from Kiva's partner Al Majmoua, in order to increase her business merchandise with necessary goods such as conservatives, cleaning detergents and sweets.
This is her first time to deal with Al Majmoua, and she is very anxious about this loan because she is sure that her business and income will improve a lot.

loans.use: To increase her business merchandise with necessary goods

loans.name: Teresita

texts.en: Teresita is 55 years old. She is married, having 6 children. She lives in Sawang, Maria, Siquijor. She's operated a food processing activity for a period of 5 years.  She earns an average monthly income of Php 2,000.00. She took a loan from PMPC to purchase raw materials in making snacks for sale. She plans to use the income to improve the living standards of the family.

loans.use: to purchase raw materials

loans.name: Watch You Neiber Group

texts.en: Zainab is the leader of this group of entrepreneurs. Zainab was born in Magburaka town, 27 years ago. She is married to a police officer and the couple has 4 children, 3 of whom are in primary and tertiary institutions. For many years now, Zainab has been selling ready-to-wear-clothes. She and her group members have come to SMT, a partner of Kiva.org base in Makeni, Northern Sierra Leone to request for a loan of 1,200,000 Sierra Leonean Leones for each in order to expand on the sizes and qualities of their respective business. With a lot of inventories in, their business will attract many customers, sales will improve and profit margin will also increase. Consequently, they are being empowered to better look after themselves and children. Zainab is going to use her share of this loan to buy a wide variety of clothes and in larger quantity to add to her current ones.

loans.use: to buy a wide variety of clothes and in larger quantity to add to her current ones

loans.name: Baru Belenpayi

texts.en:
Baru  is a 45-year-old  businesswoman  who lives in Juba. She is married and has six children between the ages of 15  and 26. All of them go to school. Baru  runs a general store, and has been in business for 10 years. She has no  employees. 

Baru heard about Finance Sudan through  other clients. She is taking a loan of  2000 sdg to purchase sodas, water,  and many other items.  In addition to this business, she has no other source of income.

In five years Baru  would like to expand her  business and open  a big shop. Her  major challenges include high  prices in the market.

Baru  says she is happy for the loans given by Finance Sudan  through the help of Kiva.

loans.use: to buy more items like sodas, water, Omo (detergent), etc

loans.name: Najwa

texts.en:
Najwa is 46-year-old divorced woman. She works selling printers and straps for bags. She has 15 years of experience in her work. Najwa likes her work, and she  always tries to improve it. With the applied-for loan from Al-Majmoua, Kiva's partner, she will buy straps and a special strap-making machine to expand her business and increase her income. She works hard and  never gets tired of seeking ways to progress in life and develop herself. She has customers from her community and from among her neighbors who recommend her products to others.

Through her last loan she was able to improve her business a lot, and she opened a new business where she employs maids from abroad, a highly recommended service these days.

She hopes to keep on improving both businesses as much as she can.

loans.use: to buy straps and a special strap making machine

loans.name: Esther

texts.en:
Esther is 35 years old, married and a mother of three children. She operates a tailoring shop in Malindi town and has been in the business for the last two years. She earns a monthly profit of KES 5,000.

She was introduced to KADET LTD by a credit officer, and she is applying for her first loan of KES.20,000. She intends to use the loan to add more stock of clothing material for making dresses in preparation for the oncoming festive season. 

She will save the anticipated profit and help pay school fees of her children. In the future, Esther hopes to grow her tailoring shop and as she intends to open up a full boutique in the area.

loans.use: to add more stock of clothing material for making dresses

loans.name: Julia

texts.en:
Julia is a widow and a resident of Murang’a, Central Kenya where she has been farming for over thirty years with tea and coffee being her main produce. She had six children with her late husband who are now all adults. She now manages her farm with the help of two farmhands.

Julia has requested a loan of 62,400 KES from Juhudi Kilimo to buy and insure a dairy cow. She says the loan will improve her farming income as well as provide milk for her family use.

She says the fluctuations in farm product prices remain the main challenge.

loans.use: To buy and insure a dairy cow

loans.name: Mary

texts.en:
Mary is a 35 years old  businesswoman who lives in Juba. She is married and has 3 children between the ages of 4  and 10. 3 of them go to school.
Mary runs a restaurant, and has been in business for 4 years. She has two employees. She heard about Finance Sudan through other clients. She is taking a loan of 2,000 SDG to purchase meat, rice and many others. In addition to this business, no other source of income.
In 5 years, Mary would like to expand her business and open a big hotel.
Her major challenges include high prices in the market.
Mary says she is happy for the loans given by Finance Sudan.

loans.use: for buying more items like meat, rice, beans etc

loans.name: Andresa

texts.en: Andresa is a resident of San Miguel, Bohol. She is 49 years old, married with 8 children. Most of them are still attending school. Andresa buys and sells vegetables and fruit for an income. She is planning on improving her business so she can help her husband who is a carpenter. She is asking for a loan to buy fruits and vegetables such as banana, papaya, squash, string beans and others. A loan will help her business become more sustainable and profitable. Her income will then provide food for her family as well as school fees for her children. In the future, she plans to increase the type of fruits and vegetable that she sells so she can have a better income for her family.

loans.use: to buy fruits and vegetables such as banana, papaya, squash, string beans and others

loans.name: C4380 Tuzamurane Group

texts.en:
Berthe is 43 years old and is married with four children aged between 4 and 10 years old. She is the first person on the left side. Berthe is the leader of a group called "C4380 Tuzamurane". This group is known for selling food like bananas, potatoes, rice, and maize. They have been in this business for two years. The business starts from 8 a.m until 8 p.m every day with eight employes to help her.
Berthe has requested the Kiva loan via Vision Finance Company s.a. in order to buy large quantities of food like bananas, potatoes, rice, beans and maize for resale. With this loan, Berthe will be able to save for her future and to reinvest in her business.

loans.use: To buy large quantities of food like bananas, potatoes, rice, and maize for resale.

loans.name: Efron

texts.en: Efron is a 32-year-old man and is married to Merry, a 33-year-old lady. They have 2 children from their marriage: Fito, 10 who is attending Elementary school grade 4 and Fredon, 5, who is attending play group. A year ago, Efron initiated a kiosk business to improve his income. He provides basic necessities i.e. sugar, cooking oil, coffee, tea, biscuits and snacks. Efron realizes that his family needs would increase sooner or later so he would like to provide more items to sell in order to increase his business income. To implement his plan, Efron is proposing a loan from TLM amounting to IDR 3,000,000. The loan would help him to provide more stocks i.e. bath soap, detergent, mosquito coils, wheat flour, salt, shampoo and mobile phone recharges.

loans.use: to provide more stocks i.e. bath soap, detergent, mosquito coils, wheat flour, salt, shampoo and mobile phone recharges.

loans.name: Itgel

texts.en:
Mr. Itgel is 25 years old and lives with his wife and daughter in a little house in Selenge province. His wife works as a seller in a supermarket and her daughter stays at home. Mr. Itgel has worked as a guard in a construction company for 4 years. Because he works one time 24 hours then rests for 72 hours, he would like to start his own business and work 24 hours off. 

Before he didn`t have a private business. Now he is planning to provide auto servicing with his brother-in-law who is experienced in repairing cars. Therefore he is starting to build a workplace and he was able to build 70 percent of the construction work from his money. Today, he is requesting a 2,500,000 MNT  loan to finish the construction work and purchase some equipment.

loans.use: To finish construction work on his car repair building and purchase some equipment

loans.name: Mavjuda

texts.en: Mavjuda is 43-year-old woman who is married and has 3 children. Her husband is a kind man who tries to help her with all deals. They must comfort their children with all modern conveniences. The fast develop of modern world makes her children more progressive. Mavjuda tries to provide them with a better quality of life. That’s why 8 years ago she began her own business, sewing national women dresses and school uniforms. Since she’s had her business, her family’s quality of life has been improving. She wants to develop her business further but she needs to buy fabrics to sew school uniforms for new season. She promises to make her payment on time. She awaits your support.

loans.use: To buy fabrics for new season

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to stock up on soy cheese to sell.

loans.name: Yusuf Dafala

texts.en:
Yusuf is a 36-year-old businesswoman who lives in Juba. She is married and has 4 children between the ages of 2 and 10. Three of them go to school.

Yusuf runs a general store, and has been in business for 4 years. She has no employees. She heard about Finance Sudan through other clients. She is taking a loan of 2000 sdg to purchase soda, water and many other things. In addition to this business, she has no other source of income.

In 5 years Yusuf would like to expand her business and open a big shop. Her major challenges include high prices in the market. Yusuf says she is happy for the loans given by Finance Sudan.

loans.use: for buying more items like soda, Omo, soap, salt, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy palm-oil, margi, salt, pepper, etc. in bulk to add to her current stock

loans.name: Julius

texts.en:
Julius is 47 years old, married, and the father of four children. For the last twelve years, he has earned a living by selling goods from his retail shop. He earns a monthly profit of KES. 15,000.

He was introduced to KADET LTD by one of our credit officers, and is applying for his fifth loan of KES. 40,000 to buy additional stock such as soft drinks, sweets, and washing detergents for resale. He will use the profits made possible by this loan to pay school fees for his children. 

His goal for the future is to continue growing his business so that he can give his family a good and stable life.

loans.use: to buy additional stock such as soft drinks, sweets, and washing detergents.

loans.name: Lutfiya

texts.en:
Lutfiya is one of the smart members of her family. She is 41 years old and she is a divorcee. She brings up three children alone. Lutfiya tries to provide them with a high quality of living conditions. 

With this aim, twelve years ago she began her own business with selling of fruits and vegetables. She has her own selling place in the local market. She wants to develop her business further, but her income is small and she can’t do it. She is asking for a loan of 4,000 Somoni to buy fruits and vegetables for developing her business. 

Each month, she will make her payment on time. She will be happy if you support her.

loans.use: to buy fruits and vegetables.

loans.name: Abdella Ibrahim

texts.en:
Abdella is a 35-year-old business woman who lives in Juba. She is married and has four children between the ages of 5 and 16. All of them go to school.

Abdella runs a general store, and has been in business for six years. She has no employees. She heard about Finance Sudan through other clients. She is taking a loan of 1,500 sdg to purchase soda, water, and many other items. In addition to this business, she has no other source of income.

In five years, Abdella would like to expand her business and open a big shop.

Her major challenges include high prices in the market.

Abdella says she is happy for the loans given by Finance Sudan through the help of Kiva.

loans.use: to buy more items like soda, water, etc. for her general store.

loans.name: Dieu D'abraham De Meyak 2 & 3 Group

texts.fr:
Sansiona est le coordinatrice de son groupe Dieu D'Abraham de Meyak 2 & 3. Elle n´est pas mariee elle ná pas d'enfants

Sansiona habite dans la région de Meyak d’Haiti où de l’éléctricité est rare et de l’eau est très limité. Elle a dirigé son commerce de Produit divers pendant les 6 dernières années. Sansiona voudrait utiliser cet emprunt pour investir dans l'augmentation de ses stocks.

Sansiona espère que cet emprunt l’aidera à agrandir son business. Des autres membres militant ont besoin d’un emprunt pour tels commerces comme Vetements, chausses, chaussures.
texts.en: Sansiona is the coordinator of the group "Dieu D'Abraham de Meyek 2 & 3" [God of Abraham of Meyak 2 & 3]. She is unmarried she has no children.  Sansiona lives in the region of Meyak in Haiti where electricity is scarce and water is very limited.  She has been running her business of selling various goods for the past six years. Sansiona would like to use this loan to invest in increasing her inventory.  Sansiona hopes that this loan will help expand her business. Other members active in the group are in need of this loan for goods such as clothing, socks and shoes.

loans.use: to buy various goods

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to expand her business by buying more stock of braids and weaves.

loans.name: Gerald

texts.en:
Gerald is a resident of Murang’a in Central Kenya where he lives with his family of seven children aged between 22 and 6 years. He has been in farming for twenty years and produces cabbages and Arabica flowers. He runs a dental clinic and butchery besides farming.

Gerald has requested a loan of 50,000 KES from Juhudi Kilimo for a venture into poultry farming. He will use the loan to buy poultry birds. He reiterates he will use the income to expand his farming business in order to generate more income to meet family needs like education.

He laments low prices for farm produce, coupled with pests.

loans.use: To buy poultry birds

loans.name: Rahab

texts.en:
Rahab lives in Murang'a, Kenya, which is a hilly, agricultural area located relatively close to Nairobi. She has two children, both of whom live with her and her husband in their four-room house.

Rahab owns two cows named Menu and Ngunu, as well as a calf that has not yet been named. This 62,400 KES is Rahab's first loan, with Juhudi Kilimo providing a crucial first step in establishing and obtaining credit. Rahab states that she chose Juhudi because "Juhudi helps farmers." The loan will be put toward the purchase of a dairy cow; by selling the milk the family's income will increase.

Rahab says that her highest monthly expense is school fees for her children, and most of the extra income arising from this loan will be used for education costs.

loans.use: to buy and insure a dairy cow.

loans.name: Mauro

texts.es:
El socio Mauro  pertenece al banco comunal UNIDOS PARA EL TRIUNFO,el socio tiene 37 años de edad ,01 hijo y es conviviente ,el socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio venta de velas,el socio lleva años en este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada dia a su negocio,el socio distribuye las velas a sus clientes que mas le solicitan ,el socio es una persona responsable y empeñosa siendo de esta manera que el socio saca adelante a su familia,el socio desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta manera seguir poayando economicamente a su familia.
El socio solicita el credito para la compra de velas al por mayor para su negocio.
EL socio se siente agradecido por el credito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
Mauro, 37, is a member of the communal bank UNIDOS PARA EL TRIUNFO [United for Victory] and has a domestic partner and a son. He performs a number of daily jobs alongside his business selling candles. The business has been prospering for years, which he attributes to his commitment each day. He sells candles to his best customers. He is responsible and dedicated, which has made him a good provider for his family. 

Mauro wants to keep working hard to financially support his family. He is requesting the loan to buy wholesale candles for his business. He is grateful for the loan and promises to make his payments.
.

loans.use: to buy wholesale candles for his business.

loans.name: Olematiko

texts.en:
Olematiko  is now thirty-nine years old and married and they are blessed with three children. His wife Nasieku assists him through farming. He will use the loan to buy more livestock like cows, sheep and goats for resale. 


He has been in business for three years now, earning an income of thirteen thousand five hundred shillings. This will be his third loan with KADET LTD. He  will use the anticipated profit to purchase more cows and sheep; he hopes he will be a prominent livestock farmer.

loans.use: To buy more cows and sheep for sale

loans.name: James

texts.en:
James is a resident of Murang’a. He is married and has three children between the ages of 16 and 32. He runs his farm with one farmhand. His farm currently produces coffee, milk, tea, poultry, and pigs.

James has requested a loan of 50,000 KES from Juhudi Kilimo to buy piglets. He says pig farming has become popular in the area. He is also motivated by the high rate of reproduction in pigs. He believes he will be able to educate his youngest child with his farming income, as well as improve his dairy farming, which does well but faces challenges of fluctuating milk prices and feed prices. He laments of the high cost of farming inputs.

loans.use: To buy piglets

loans.name: Adiza

texts.en:
For the past 5 years, Adiza has cooked and sold kenkey (fermented maize dough) in Esuakyire, near Abura. She serves it with fried fish, pepper and tomato sauce. Adiza is married and has 2 children. She uses her income for her children's general upkeep.

Adiza will use her loan to purchase bags of maize and fish to prepare her kenkey for sale. She hopes to use the new profit from her expanded business to mount a better stall to sell her kenkey.

loans.use: to purchase bags of maize and fish for preparing kenkey

loans.name: Ugul

texts.ru: Угул проживает в городе Истаравшан. Ей 46 лет. Она замужем. У нее двое детей. Угул более 20 лет занимается скотоводством. Она работает усердно, чтобы увеличить поголовья скота и получить больше прибыли. Угул разводит крупнорогатый скот в дальнейшем для продажи. Она просит кредит для закупа телят.
texts.en: Ugul lives in the city of Istaravshan.  She is 46 years old, married and has two children.  Ugul has been involved in animal husbandry for over 20 years.  She works hard to increase the livestock headcount and make a larger profit.  Ugul breeds cattle for subsequent sale.  She is requesting this loan to buy calves.

loans.use: to buy calves

loans.name: Dieu D'abraham De Meyak 1, 4 & 5 Group

texts.fr:
Jasmin est le coordinatrice de son groupe Dieu D'Abraham de Meyak 1, 4 & 5. Elle est mariee elle a 4 d'enfants

Jasmin habite dans la région de Meyak d’Haiti où de l’éléctricité est rare et de l’eau est très limité. Elle a dirigé son commerce de vetement pendant les 7 dernières années.

Jasmin voudrait utiliser cet emprunt pour investir avec du vetement. Elle espère que cet emprunt l’aidera à agrandir son business. Jasmin dit que ses défis principale est de un grande commerçant

Jasmin dit que son but principale est d'être une grand entrepreneur.
texts.en:
Jasmin is the coordinator of the group "Dieu D'Abraham de Meyak 1, 4 & 5" [God of Abraham of Meyak 1, 4 & 5].  She is married and has four children.  Jasmin lives in the region of Meyak in Haiti where electricity is scarce and water is very limited.  She has been running her clothing business for the past seven years.

Jasmin would like to use this loan to invest in clothing for resale.  She hopes that this loan will help her to expand her business.  Jasmin says that her main challenge is competition from large retailers, and that her primary goal is to be a great entrepreneur.

loans.use: to purchase clothing for resale

loans.name: Vestine

texts.en:
Vestine is 30 years old and is married. Vestine owns a studio business selling DVDs and CDs. This is her fourth year in this business and the hours of her work are from 9 am until 8 pm every day. She currently employs one person to help her. 

Vestine has requested a Kiva loan via Vision Finance Company in order to expand her studio business by buying more DVDs and CDs for resale. With the profit, she will be able to save for her future and reinvest in her business.

loans.use: To buy more DVDs and CDs to resell.

loans.name: Claudio Gerardo

texts.es:
Claudio Gerardo tiene 40 años de edad, Es casado vive con la esposa y con los hijos en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos. 

Los miembros de la V.R.C. EL DIVINO NIÑO, se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Estero Lindo, perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto como siembre de maíz y arroz.

Claudio Gerardo se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz y arroz. Compra sus productos en Ventanas.

Solicita el crédito para compra de semillas y a bonos de maiz y arroz, insecticidas, urea, ranger. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. El sueño es tener dinero para ayudar  a los hijos.

En el tiempo libre le gusta practicar el deporte y hacer quehaceres domésticos.
texts.en:
Claudio Gerardo is 40 years old and married.  He lives with his wife and children in the Ventanas canton in the Los Ríos province.

The members of El Divino Niño communal bank are located in the Estero Lindo precinct in the Ventanas canton.  This communal bank devotes itself to growing short cycle crops like corn and rice.

Claudio Gerardo grows corn and rice, and he buys his products in Ventanas.

He is requesting the loan to buy corn and rice seeds, fertilizer, insecticide, urea, and Ranger for weeds.  The support of the loan will help him financially to supply his necessities.

His dream is to have money in order to help his children.

In his free time he likes to play sports and do household chores.

loans.use: to buy corn and rice seeds, fertilizer, insecticide, urea, and Ranger for weeds.

loans.name: Yolanda Zulema

texts.es:
Yolanda Zulema tiene 43 años, Es casada vive con el esposo y con los hijos , en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos. 

Los miembros de la V.R.C. EL DIVINO NIÑO, se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Estero Lindo, perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto como siembre de maíz y arroz.

Yolanda Zulema se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, además se dedica ala crianza de gallinas, cerdos. Los productos los compra y los vende en Ventanas.

Solicita el crédito para comprar semillas, abonos, urea, insecticidas. Con el apoyo del crédito podra dedicarce a las siembras. Enfrenta desafíos como plagas en los cultivos. El sueño es apoyar a los hijos.

Le gusta pasar en familia.
texts.en:
Yolanda Zulema, 43, is married and lives with her husband and children in Ventanas canton in Los Ríos province. The members of the communal bank EL DIVINO NIÑO [The Divine Child] live in Estero Lindo, located in Ventanas canton. The group performs seasonal farmwork such as planting corn and rice. 

Yolanda Zulema plants corn and also raises chickens and pigs. She buys and sells her products in Ventanas. She is requesting the loan to buy seeds, fertilizer, and pesticides so that she can plant. Her dream is to support her children, and she loves to spend time with her family.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizer, and pesticides.

loans.name: Kamar

texts.en:
Kamar is 26 years old. He is not married yet. He lives with his parents and has always wanted to provide a good quality of life. It’s for this reason that two years ago he began his own business with driving. Thanks to his good service, he has managed to gain many customers. He is asking for a loan to repair his car. 

In this way his business will have the opportunity to provide better service and to increase his income which allows him to offer his family a better quality of life and better financial opportunities for getting ahead.

loans.use: To repair the car he uses as a taxi

loans.name: Badridin

texts.ru: Бадридин родился 1963 году в городе Вахдат. Он живет с женой. Более двадцати пяти лет он работает таксистом. В этой области Бадридин имеет богатый опыт. Он развозит пассажиров по городу и за пределами города. Бадридин просит кредит для ремонта своего легкового автомобиля.
texts.en: Badridin was born in 1963 in the city of Vahdat.  He lives with his wife.  He has been working as a taxi driver for over twenty-five years.  Badridin has a rich experience in this field.  He transports passengers within the city and outside the city limits.  Badridin is requesting this loan to repair his passenger vehicle.

loans.use: to repair his car

loans.name: Alberta

texts.en: For the past 5 years, Alberta has been selling secondhand ladies' and children' dresses. She is married and her husband works for the fire services. Alberta uses her income to support her husband in paying their utility and accommodation bills. Alberta needs this loan to purchase more secondhand ladies' and children's dresses to sell. She plans to use the new profits to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more secondhand ladies' and children's dresses to sell

loans.name: Nina

texts.en:
Nina is 55 years old and lives in a small village in Telavi district. She is married and has a grown son. Her husband works as a house painter and earns a monthly income. Nina’s son helps her to run their dairy business, which includes 4 milking cows. Nina milks her cows every day and produces cheese, which is sold locally. Nina also works as a teacher at the local school and earns a monthly salary. She is a very hardworking woman, with rich experience in her work.

Nina has requested a loan to purchase land where she will build a new house for her son. With this loan, she will be able to ensure her son with better living conditions and the means to live separately. Nina awaits your support.

loans.use: to purchase land to build a new house for her son

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy bags of rice, beans and other ingredients to prepare "waakye" for sale

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase coal

loans.name: Noel

texts.en:
For the last four years Noel has been operating a car wash in Oloitoktok town. He is 28 years old and married to Margaret. They have one school-going child.

He was introduced to KADET LTD by KADET staff. This will be his second loan, which he intends to use to buy more detergents and water pipes for the car wash business.

In the future, Noel hopes to expand his business and increase his income.

loans.use: to buy more detergents and water pipes for his car wash

loans.name: Rakhmat

texts.ru: Рахмат- мужчина средних лет,хороший семьянин и отец взрослых детей.По профессии Рахмат сварщик и в данное время занимается производством железных ворот.Раньше, он когда первый раз обратился в нашу организацию,он занимался торговлей продуктов питания и одежды за пределами города вместе с сыновьями.У них была собственная грузовая автомашина и на ней они возили товар в районы.По истечении времени с возрастом он устал ехать в дальние районы и решил заняться делом по своей профессии.Сейчас Рахмат производит ворота и ограждения в арендованном цехе на продажу.Его продукцию заказывают также в районы и сельские местности и его сыновья продают их на собственном автомобиле.В нашей организации Рахмат получает кредит уже больше два года и каждый кредит использует на покупку сырья.Он не жалуется на жизнь и гордо зарабатывает свой хлеб несмотря на свой возраст и помощь детей.
texts.en: Rakhmat is a middle-age man, a good family man and a father of adult children.  He is a welder by trade and is currently involved in manufacturing iron gates.  Previously, when he first came to our organization, he and his sons were involved in selling food products and clothing outside the city limits.  They had their own truck, which they used to deliver merchandise to districts.  With time and age, Rakhmat got tired of traveling to distant districts and decided to get involved in a business in his own trade.  Currently, he manufactures gates and fences at a leased factory for sale.  His products are also ordered for the districts and rural areas, and his sons sell them, using their truck.  Rakhmat has been obtaining loans from our organization for over two years and has used each loan to purchase raw materials.  He does not complain of life and earns his bread proudly, despite his age and his children's help.

loans.use: to purchase raw materials for manufacturing gates

loans.name: Dinarakhan

texts.ru:
Динарахан 53 года, замужем, воспитала 3 детей. Динарахан в качестве основного источника дохода для своей семьи, на протяжении  5 лет занимается полеводством  и животноводством, начав этот бизнес с суммы в 15,000 сом (KGS). Благодаря упорному труду Динарахан в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний  день имеется 1 дойная корова с приплодом, 1,4 га земли, где выращивает фасоль, кукурузу, картофель и многолетние травы,  ежемесячная прибыль от хозяйства составляет около 5,000 сом (KGS). 
В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Динарахан обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 20,000 сом (KGS)  на покупку телят.  Доходы от кредита Динарахан планирует вкладывать в развитие бизнеса посредством реконструкции сарая и улучшения условий содержания скота.
texts.en: Dinarakhan is 53 years old, married and raised three children.  To provide the primary source of income for her family, she has been involved in farming and animal husbandry for five years, having started this business with a sum of 15,000 som (KGS).  Thanks to Dinarakhan's hard work, today her business contains one dairy cow with offspring and 1.4 hectares of land, where she grows beans, corn, potatoes and perennial herbs.  The monthly profit from the business amounts to about 5,000 som (KGS).  In order to further develop her business, Dinarakhan requested a loan in the amount of 20,000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum and Partners" company to buy calves.  She plans to invest the earnings from the loan into a continued business development by remodeling a barn and improving the conditions for keeping livestock.

loans.use: to purchase calves

loans.name: Realite De Dericour Group

texts.fr:
Coeurcivil  est le coordinateur de son groupe Realite de Dericour de Bras de Lance. il n´est pas marie et il a 5 enfants. Il  habite dans la région Trou Du Nord  d’Haiti où de l’éléctricité est rare et de l’eau est très limité. 

Coeurcivil a dirigé son commerce de d´artisanat pendant les 9 dernières années. Avant de commencer ce commerce, il cultivait la terre.  Il voudrait utiliser cet emprunt pour investir d'acheter leurs artisans ses œuvres. Coeurcivil espère que cet emprunt l’aidera à agrandir son commerce.

Coeurcivil dit que ses défis principale est de devenir un plus  un grand commercant et Il dit que son but principale c'est d'avoir plus d'argent pour obtenir un plus grand commerce avec l'aide de Dieu.
texts.en:
Coeurcivil is the coordinator of the group Realite de Dericour de Bras de Lance. He is a single man with five children. He lives in the region of Trou Du Nord, in Haiti, where electricity is scarce and water supplies are limited. 

Coeurcivil has been running a crafts shop for nine years. Prior to that, he was a farmer. He wants to use this loan to invest in his business by purchasing handicrafts. 


Coeurcivil hopes that this credit will help him to expand his business. His primary objective is to become an important businessman, and his main goal is to have more money to expand his business with the help of God.

loans.use: to buy handicrafts for resale.

loans.name: Havasmo

texts.ru:
Хавасмо жительница города Вахдат. Она родилась 1961 году. Хавасмо замужем. У нее трое детей. Она домохозяйка. Хавасмо трудолюбивая женщина. Ее муж находится в Российской Федерации. После отъезда мужа Хавасмо решила заняться своей деятельностью. Сейчас ей помогают ее родители, так как она не работает. 
Хавасмо хочет заняться животноводством. Она просит кредит для закупа телят. Хавасмо надеется на вашу помощь. Она будет очень рада если вы поможете ей.
texts.en: Havasmo is a resident of the city of Vahdat.  She was born in 1961.  Havasmo is married and has three children.  She is a homemaker.  Havasmo is a hardworking woman.  Her husband is in the Russian Federation.  After her husband's departure, Havasmo decided to get involved in her own business.  Currently, her parents help her because she does not work.  Havasmo wants to get involved in animal husbandry.  She is requesting this loan to buy calves.  She will be very happy if you would help her.

loans.use: to buy calves

loans.name: Juhudi Group

texts.fr: La cliente Christine, leader du groupe d’affaire « Juhudi », est entrepreneur, âgée d’environ 51 ans, mariée, mère de 10 enfants qui étudient tous et d’autres ont leurs propres foyers. Elle est vendeuse de tissus. Son mari est un hôtelier, alors maître cuisinier. Elle installe ses marchandises au long de la rue ambiante des avenues. Elle commença cette activité avec son fonds propre reçu de son conjoint.  Il y a 10 ans révolus qu’elle exerce ces activités. Cependant, elle vient de réaliser 24 cycles dans le programme de microcrédit de Hekima. Ce nouveau crédit doit lui servir de s’approvisionner avec un ballons de tissus (draps de lit). En plus, elle ambitionne scolariser ses enfants et acheter une parcelle pour y construire confortablement. La cliente remercie Hekima pour ses actions en faveur de pauvres femmes exclues de banque classique.
texts.en:
Christine is an entrepreneur and the leader of the business group Juhudi. She is approximately 51 years old and a married mother of ten children who all go to school. Some of them live on their own. 

Christine sells fabrics. Her husband runs a hotel where he is a chef. Christine displays her merchandise along busy streets and avenues. She started this activity 10 years ago with her own capital given to her by her spouse. She has now completed 24 loan cycles with Hekima’s microfinance program, and this new loan will allow her to buy one bundle of fabric (bed sheets). 

She wants to provide for her children’s tuition and buy a plot of land to build a comfortable home. 

Christine wishes to thank the Hekima MFI for helping poor women who do not have access to traditional banks.

loans.use: to buy one bundle of fabric (bed sheets).

loans.name: Roberta

texts.en:
Roberta, 57 years old, is from Bohol, Philippines. She is married and has four children. Roberta has been in the vegetable farming business for more than ten years, growing eggplant, beans and other vegetables.

Roberta works hard to support her husband in meeting the family's needs. She is presently in need of funds for her farm and is requesting a loan of 5,000 PHP to buy fertilizers and additional seedlings to plant. With this loan she will be able to produce good quality products from the farm, thus augmenting their sales and profit at the same time.

Roberta dreams of expanding her business and making it a success. Moreover, she wants to experience the fullness of life together with her family. The revenue generated from the business will be used to finance the family's daily consumption, to reinvest in the business and to put money aside for savings.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and additional seedlings to plant

loans.name: Efua

texts.en: Efua  lives with her husband and 4 children in Esuskyire, near Abura. For the past 15 years, she has been selling soap bars and powdered soap. Efua uses her income to assist her husband in paying their children’s school fees.  Efua will use her loan to purchase a variety of soaps to sell. She will expand her business with the new profit.

loans.use: to purchase a variety of soaps to sell

loans.name: Maria Liliana

texts.es:
La señora María, es socia del banco comunal “Las Pomarrosas”, Distrito Coronel portillo, Departamento de Ucayali, tiene 48 años de edad, se encuentra separada de su esposo y tiene un hijo.
Lleva tres ciclos trabajando con este banco comunal quien le dió una buena acogida y no se equivocaron en aceptarla porque es una buena socia, ella se dedica a la venta de productos nutricionales.
Con su nuevo préstamo de S/. 1,000.00 nuevos soles comprará: 3 frascos de  batidos, 2 frascos de té sabor a   limón, 2 energizan tés,  2 frascos de proteínas.
Cuenta con un grupo de 14 personas que son clientes fijos y otros que cada día llegan a su casa para tomar sus batidos y para aprender a comer sano.
Agradece a Manuela Ramos por darle la mano cuando más lo necesitaba, gracias a los préstamos ha podido invertir en sus productos y crecer cada día.
texts.en:
María is a member of the Las Pomarrosas communal bank in the Coronel Portillo district in the department of Ucayali.  She is 48 years old, is separated from her husband and has one son.  

She has participated in three loan cycles with this communal bank that has given her a good reception and they were not wrong to accept her because she is a good member.  She makes a living in the sale of nutritional products.

With this new loan of 1,000 soles (PEN) she will buy:  three bottles of shake mixes, two bottles of lemon-flavored tea, two energizing teas and two bottles of protein.  She has a group of 14 people that are regular customers and others that come every day to her house to drink her shakes and to learn how to eat healthy.

She is grateful to Manuela Ramos for giving her a hand when she needed it most.  Thanks to the loans she has been able to invest in her products and grow her business every day.

loans.use: to buy shake mixes and teas.

loans.name: Niyoz

texts.ru: Ниезу 27 лет. Он женат и на воспитании имеет одного ребенка. В семье их семеро человек, так как его родители, брат и его сестра живут вмести с ним. С целью обеспечения семьи Ниез начал свой бизнес 8 лет назад с животноводством, но 2 года назад он поменял бизнес. В данное время он продает промышленные товары. Его жена помогает ему в ведении бизнеса. Ниез запрашивает кредит на сумму 3000 долларов США для покупки промышленных товаров для расширения ассортимента. Он ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Niyoz is 27 years old.  He is married and raising one child.  There are seven people in his family because his parents, brother and sister live together with him.  To provide for his family, Niyoz started his own business eight years ago with animal husbandry, but changed his business focus two years ago.  At the present time, he sells household goods.
